title: Real-Time Video Processing Service with Milestone XProtect
context: Developed a video processing service for real-time video stream analysis, integrated with Milestone XProtect VMS.
architecture: Microservices architecture using GStreamer for video streaming, OpenVINO and DL Streamer for AI inference, Docker for containerization, and WebSocket for real-time communication with the VMS.
role: Lead Engineer - Designed the system architecture, implemented video processing pipelines, and created a command interface in XProtect Smart Client.
results: Enabled real-time object detection (people, vehicles, faces) using OpenVINO and DL Streamer
Created a command interface in XProtect Smart Client to manage the service Docker container
Facilitated real-time metadata exchange via WebSocket
Successfully integrated with Milestone XProtect VMS

title: Facial Recognition-Based Security Solution
context: Enhanced the security of Leoni's CSWIN software access systems by addressing vulnerabilities in traditional authentication methods.
architecture: Designed, developed, and integrated a facial recognition-based solution using deep learning techniques.
role: AI Engineer - Developed and integrated the facial recognition solution bolstering the software's security.
results: Bolstered software security through advanced biometric authentication
Addressed vulnerabilities in traditional authentication methods
Successfully integrated with existing CSWIN software

title: Detection and Tracking of Dynamic Objects in Videos
context: Developed a system for detecting and tracking dynamic objects in videos using advanced computer vision algorithms.
architecture: Implemented Python, OpenCV, and YOLOv5 for object detection in each video frame. Utilized correlation and Kalman filtering for continuous object tracking.
role: Computer Vision Engineer - Implemented detection and tracking algorithms and optimized for video processing.
results: Achieved robust detection and tracking of dynamic objects
Utilized Kalman filtering for continuous and accurate object tracking
Implemented efficient processing pipeline using YOLOv5

title: Intelligent System Diagnosis
context: Employed artificial intelligence to diagnose and automatically resolve issues within a complex industrial system.
architecture: Integrated sensors for real-time system monitoring, employing machine learning for anomaly detection and automated solutions.
role: AI Engineer - Developed anomaly detection models and automated resolution strategies.
results: Elevated system reliability, efficiency, and operational performance
Implemented real-time monitoring and automated fault resolution
Successfully diagnosed complex system issues using AI

title: Object Detection and Grasping with ABB Robot
context: Developed a vision system to detect parts and compute their 3D poses for accurate grasp planning for an ABB 6-axis robot.
architecture: Vision system for part detection and 3D pose computation using OpenCV and transformation matrices. Orientation analysis for accurate grasp planning.
role: Robotics Engineer - Developed vision system and programmed robot motion for accurate grasping.
results: Achieved accurate 3D pose estimation for robotic grasping
Enabled precise grasp planning for an ABB 6-axis robot
Integrated vision and robotics for automated part handling

title: Obstacle Detection through Shape Recognition and Classification
context: Developed a robotic system capable of real-time object recognition and classification using YOLO for obstacle avoidance.
architecture: Real-time object recognition and classification using YOLO. Optimized robot's movement trajectory for efficient navigation.
role: Robotics Engineer - Implemented real-time detection and optimized navigation trajectories.
results: Enabled real-time object recognition and classification for robotics
Optimized movement trajectory for efficient obstacle avoidance
Improved robotic navigation in complex environments

title: Personal Portfolio Website: My Resume and Projects
context: Crafted an interactive website featuring my resume and professional projects.
architecture: Developed using Django, Python, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, pgAdmin, and SQL.
role: Full Stack Developer - Designed and developed the entire portfolio website and database.
results: Showcased expertise in web development and database management
Created an interactive platform highlighting work and experience
Successfully deployed a professional personal portfolio
